beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 13 ▓▓▓▓|$hero_name makes with|their hands a sound,|very annoyed..

beats.text: ‘Too hard. Listen to that. It rings like a hollow nut. There is no life in this ground. It is a shell,’ |VS| said $hero_name tapping their hand on the pavement covering $avatar_street street.
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 13 ▓▓▓▓|$hero_name grabs your|hand so you could|feel it too.

beats.text: ‘Look at the tracks. Not paw prints... but lines. White lines and yellow lines!’ |VS| observed $hero_name with curiosity picking up from the street another page of the journal.
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 13 ▓▓▓▓|$hero_name gets closer|trying to have|a better look.

beats.text: ‘Bah. My pads are aching already. This is no place for a bear. It leads to the cages, surely.’ |VS| $hero_name lifted one of their legs trying to skip the feeling of the street pavement.
‘We have marked this danger in the journal. Good. Now, keep your nose to the wind. Look for the next page blowing in the grass. Let's find a softer path.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 13  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
